Detailed Description

template<class ValueType_, unsigned BlockSize_>
class stream::compute_sorted_runs_type< ValueType_, BlockSize_ >

Computes sorted runs type from value type and block size.

Template parameters

  • ValueType_ type of values ins sorted runs
  • BlockSize_ size of blocks where sorted runs stored
